ch.phonon

Class StarPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • ch.phonon.StarPoint

  • public class StarPoint
extends java.util.Observable
    Author:
    phonon A StarPoint represents the global location of an object in reference to the global coordinate system. Drawable objects have an internal LocalOrientation relative to the StarPoint.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StarPoint()
      The standard constructor is identified with the global coordinate (0,0) of the user space.
      StarPoint(double x, double y)
      This constructor allows to set directly the components of the star point in the user space.
      StarPoint(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point)
